Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hello, can you tell me about this account 1868932769606688769, one of the popups was rejected before, it had many links rejected, will this affect the rest of the ads on this account to work properly?

Hi there! I can help you with that. If a popup or ad was rejected due to having many links, it could potentially affect the performance of other ads on the same account. It's important to ensure that all ads comply with our guidelines to avoid any issues. If you need more specific details about your account, please provide more information or contact our support team directly.
So what can I do to fix this and what can I do to get my account back to normal

To fix this issue and get your account back to normal, you should follow these steps:
1. **Review the Rejected Ad**: Understand why the ad was rejected. Common reasons include having too many links or not adhering to our ad policies.
2. **Edit the Ad**: Make necessary changes to ensure it complies with NewsBreak’s ad policies. Remove any excessive links and ensure the content aligns with our guidelines.
3. **Submit for Review**: Once you've made the necessary changes, resubmit the ad for review.
4. **Check Other Ads**: Review your other ads to ensure they also comply with our guidelines to prevent future rejections.
For more detailed information on how to avoid future rejections, you can refer to this article: [My ad got rejected - What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next)
If you need further assistance, feel free to contact our support team.
